entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
